title: Hello Counselor
overview: Hello Counselor is a talk show with an emphasis on people and their stories. From stories about the daily lives of regular people regardless of their age or gender to concerns that are too embarrassing to reveal! Our program will bring laughter and move your heart. The purpose of this program is to help take down communication barriers by sharing stories about life. Comedians Shin Dongyeop, Jeong Chanwu, Kim Taegyun, and Lee Yeongja are the hosts of this program with various special guests appearing on the show weekly.
